Our personal data should be portable as we adventure around the internet, just like in the physical world. 

How do we get there?

Standards are the first step, such as @signinwitheth, ISO mDLs/mdocs, or W3C Verifiable Credentials.

For our data to be useful across different industries and across borders, everyone needs to agree on standardized data formats to support interoperability.

Convergence on global standards accelerates innovation for real-world applications and various industry use cases.
